summary: Radu, son of gypsies is the only one that has left the gypsy village. The village, named Dallas, consists of shacks and is built near a garbage dump, the source of income for the completely... See full synopsis »
cast: Zsolt Bogdán|Dorka Gryllus|Oszkár Nyári|Miklós Székely B.|Radu Amzulescu|Bence Mányoki|Kálmán Hollai|Julianna Kovacs|Ioan Batinas|Casparov Bucuresteanu|Aura Calarasu|Mihaela Cimpeanu|Lajos Csiszér|Csaba Damokos|János Derzsi|Zoltán Fülöp|Gyula Horváth|Judit Jónás|Zoltán Kovács|László Kántor|Gizella Molnár|Tibor Pálffy|Bogdan Uritescu|Dorel Visan
title: Dallas Pashamende
